venn.graph
Class HistogramStat

java.lang.Object
  venn.graph.Histogram
      venn.graph.HistogramStat

public class HistogramStat
extends Histogram

This class provides provides additional statistical measures of the histogram distribution.

getBinError

public double getBinError(int bin)
Return the error for a particular bin.

Parameters:
from - 0 to highest bin value

makeBinErrors

public void makeBinErrors()
Calculate the error on each bin according to the sqrt (bin contents) from std. dev. of Poisson distribution.

packErrors

public boolean packErrors(double[] errors)
Pack the errors on each bin.

Parameters:
false - if array size doesn't match number of bins.

add

public void add(double x)
Add an entry to the histogram, plus calculate the power sums (if flag set) for each entry rather than from the bin values.

Overrides:
add in class Histogram
Parameters:
non-zero - length array of int values.

setDataStats

public void setDataStats(boolean flag)
Turn on or off the accumulation and calculation of the data statistics.

getDataStats

public double[] getDataStats()
Get the statistical measures of the distribution calculated from the entry values.

Returns:
values in double array correspond to mean,standard deviation, error on the mean, skewness, and kurtosis. If the number of entries is zero or the statistics accumulation is turned off (see setStats () method), a null value will return
